message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start the conversation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $11,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.  What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
